overview: Vanessa (Casey Kisses) has to find another career path after she was caught having sex with one of her patients. When she sees an online ad for an anatomy instructor, the beautiful young nurse decides to share her knowledge of anatomy with a night class. But teaching is not easy, especially when she has a loudmouth in class like Frank (Pierce Paris), and a timid and cute student like Sam (Dante Colle). Vanessa had no problem rejecting Frank multiple times, but Sam is capable of causing more damage to her new career. She doesnt want to risk losing her teaching position but she starts developing feelings for Sam that she cant deny. Unfortunately for her, things become even more complicated when hes also hot for his teacher.
title: Hot For My TS Teacher
